property_description: Luxury Waterside  Living. Available on the 31st of September. Superb two bedroom apartment in excellent condition throughout. It benefits from an abundance of features including a large living space, quality finishes, wrap around balcony, bespoke kitchen, high ceilings and both bedrooms with ensuites.  The advertised price is excluding bills but it is also available including all bills (heating, internet, cable, water, mangement fees etc) and the price would be adjusted for the cost of the bills. The upmarket Spencer Dock development boasts its own Luas Stop and resident's concierge service. The property features a welcoming entrance hall, an open plan living/dining room, contemporary kitchen, two double bedrooms and both ensuite. There is a wrap around balcony in the open living area and the apartment is a corner apartment so balcony faces 2 ways.   Features include 24 hour security and electronic gated entrance, A professional and experienced concierge dedicated to providing residents with a wide variety of services, high ceilings, energy efficient gas fired central heating system and beautifully landscaped courtyard. A viewing is highly recommended.   Vibrant location in the heart of the thriving Docklands with a range of social amenities and high profile employers on the doorstep. A number of landmarks are minutes' walk away including the Dublin Convention Centre, The Three Arena, the iconic Bord Gáis Energy Theatre and the National College of Ireland.   Spencer Dock is exceptionally well connected with a range of transport options nearby, including inter-city Rail, Dart and LUAS, and also Dublin Port and the Port Tunnel with direct access to the airport nearby. Dublin bikes and airport transfer location near by also.The development has matured into an oasis of tranquality amid the bustle of the city centre.     Secure underground parking and car spaces are available to rent separately.    Spencer Dock has an unrivalled level of public transport immediately available.   * Connelly Train station: nearby  * Luas tram stop: on site * Port Tunnel: approx. 5 minutes drive * Airport: approx.15 mins via port tunnel * City bikes and taxis along the river

property_description: Bergins are delighted to bring to the market this fully redecorated and impeccably presented penthouse apartment.   Number 12 Joyce Hall is a spacious 2/3 bedroom Penthouse apartment, in the very well regarded Carrickmines Wood development. The property extends to 200 sq meters and is a bright dual aspect property, with two extensive terraces, with views East and West.   Accommodation includes:  Entrance lobby, with two separate entrances - the first, with security key via stairs in to a large bright entrance lobby with stairs to the penthouse. The second is a dedicated lift entrance, opening directly in to the penthouse lobby.  The lobby area is panelled with hand painted treatments and includes a walk in utility closet/storage area, with freezer, etc.   Double doors open from the entrance lobby in to the main hall of the apartment.   To the right of this hall, the open plan living and dining room has large floor to ceiling windows on both sides, maximising light. Flooring is marble tiling, and the space complimented with a range of custom built display units, etc.   There is a sandstone gas fireplace and furnishing includes a full suite of drawing room furniture and a large dining table with seating for 8-10.   Kitchen  The kitchen is a seperate space, off the dining area. HIgh and low level units are handpainted with a solid stone counter top, integrated appliances and a door to the rear terrace.   Master bedroom suite.  Access off the main hall, and overlooking the front of the building, this is an exceptionally large room, with a full wall of custom built wardrobes, a walk in wardrobe, and a travertine tiled bathroom with Shower, WC, WHB and jacuzzi bath.  This room is fully carpeted and very well appointed.   Bedroom 2 At the end of the main hall, this is a further double, overlooking the rear of the house, with built in wardrobes, shelving and a door to the rear garden.   Family Bathroom  With shower, wc and whb.   Laundry  Purpose built cabinets outside the family bathroom contain a washing machine and tumble dryer conveniently hidden away and with good storage.   Bedroom 3/Study.  this room is fitted with both wardrobes and library shelving and desk area, and is presented as a study. With windows overlooking rear terrace, this would make a very pleasant and functional home office.   Number 12 Joyce Hall includes two designated parking spaces, but is within walking distance of the Luas at Carrickmines, as well as walking distance to Foxrock and Cabinteely.   The Park at Cabinteely is a superb local amenity, within walking distance.   Road access includes M50 to M11 and to Dublin Airport, M1 etc. The N11 is close by, and the area is well served by bus routes, shops and services.

property_description: Liam Reilly Auctioneers have the pleasure to present 26 Dunluce in the exclusive Dunluce development set in the heart of Ballbridge. This Stunning Three Bedroom Penthouse Apartment is a first time let and just of Dodder River, overlooking Herbert Park to the west and views towards the Dublin Mountains to the south. Designed by the multi award winning DTA Architects, this apartment is truly unique and offers more than breathtaking living accommodation. Comprising of three large double bedrooms with built in wardrobes, three bathrooms with fittings by Villeroy & Boch, large kitchens designed by Kitchen Elegance with fitted appliances leading into an open plan living area with floor to ceiling windows and corner balconies that are arranged to avail of the landscape views. This Magnificent A-Rated property has a Combi-Boiler heating system with contemporary radiators, insulation that exceeds the standard requirements and comes with car parking. The property also boasts a basement storage area which is available for each apartment. Dunluce Apartments are located in one of Dublin's most upmarket locations adjacent to the world renowned RDS and a short stroll to the green open spaces of Herbert Park. The desirable villages of Ballsbridge and Donnybrook are nearby with their boutique shops, eateries and artisan produce while local transport links are plentiful with numerous bus routes along nearby Merrion Road/N11 and the DART conveniently located at Sandymount station. Sporting enthusiasts will appreciate the facilities provided at the RDS stadium, Old Belvedere R.F.C, Merrion Cricket Club, Bective Lawn Tennis Club and in Herbert Park. Numerous highly regarded primary and secondary schools such as Teresians School, St. Michael's College and Muckross Park School are within close proximity, as are University College Dublin and Trinity College Dublin.

Levmoss Hall is nestled away in the cozy surroundings of beautifully landscaped gardens, bordered by a large park with playground and tennis courts.  The convenience of this location cannot be overstated, with a host of shopping and recreational facilities on your doorstep including: Leopardstown Shopping Centre, Carrickmines Retail Park, Dundrum Town Centre, Stepaside and Foxrock villages, Westwood and Ballyogan gyms, Carrickmines lawn tennis club and numerous local golf courses etc. There are also a wide range of schools in the area. property_title: Apt 11 WATERFALL COURT, WATERFALL AVENUE, Drumcondra, Dublin 9
property_description: MOVEHOME ESTATE AGENTS .... are delighted to offer a completely refurbished modern 1 bedroom ground floor apartment which is ideally located on the city\'s doorstep. This wonderful apartment offers luxury and convenience, with the added advantage of ample internal storage and space.  This apartment boasts newly fitted kitchen, bathroom, wardrobes, flooring and PVC windows. Apt 11 145/147 Richmond Road is situated in a well-established area, on the corner of Drumcondra, Fairview & Ballybough with numerous schools, shops and recreational facilities in the locality. Drumcondra train station is just 10 minutes stroll away and Dublin city centre is within a 15 minute walk. Drumcondra is also well serviced by numerous bus routes. Located within walking distance of the City Centre and convenient to the numerous shops, cafes, bars and restaurants Drumcondra & Fairview villages have to offer. Easy access is enjoyed to the IFSC, East Point Business Park, Dublin Airport, Beaumont, Mater & Temple Street Hospitals, DCU, Trinity and the M1 & M50 motorways. The area is very well serviced by a great public transport system and Drumcondra is also the centre of learning. Several of Ireland\'s most prestigious educational institutions are within walking distance, including St Patrick\'s College of Education, Mater Dei Institute of Education and All Hallows College. All 3 are associated with nearby Dublin City University. The green open spaces and its close proximity to the city make it a unique location. You can walk to Drumcondra Station to use the Arrow rail service and there are also numerous bus routes servicing Drumcondra and Fairview, including a Quality Bus Corridor (QBC). Early viewing is essential to appreciate all this wonderful apartment has to offer and is by appointment with MOVEHOME ESTATE AGENTS ... 01-8844690

property_title: Ard Na Mara, Malahide, Co. Dublin
property_description: A bright and beautifully finished apartment in a great location. Please send me an email if you're interested in coming to view. Thank you.  The apartment is on the ground floor and has its own entrance. Top quality materials were used throughout. The rooms all have light honey-coloured paint and wood floors, except for the hall, kitchen, and bathroom, which have tiled floors. The heating is via energy-efficient electric radiators and the apartment is fully insulated to minimise heating use. The layout maximises space and all the doors are glass to maximise light. The accommodation consists of:  - A large front room containing a three-seater Parker Knoll sofa, coffee table, a radiator, and a storage cabinet. - A double bedroom containing two bedside lockers, a brass-and-enamel bedframe, a mattress with mattress cover, a radiator, adjustable wood slatted blinds, and a double mirrored Sliderobe wardrobe with fitted interior. - A small hallway with tiled floor and storage space. - A bathroom with tiled floor, a hand-basin and mirror, a lavatory, heater, extractor fan, and an electric shower in a roomy enclosure. The door and window of the bathroom have privacy glass. - A corridor leads to a bright fitted kitchen with tiled floor, Shaker-style cabinets, a four-burner hob with grill and full oven, a combination washing and tumble drying machine, a fridge-freezer, oodles of storage cupboards, a radiator, and an extending table and four chairs.  The apartment comes equipped with a kettle, toaster, pots and pans, crockery, cutlery, an ironing board and iron, a microwave, a hoover, and so on.  Externally there is a roofed open-sided porch framing the front door, with outdoor seating. The gardens around the apartment were laid out by a Gold-medal winning gardener and are now mature; the front garden has flower-beds and flowering trees, and the large back garden has a small screened-off area containing a clothes-line, compost containers and storage, but the majority of the space is laid to lawn and surrounded by shrubbery and trees. There's a pond and bird-tables in one corner, and a patio with a swing-chair in another. The high walls mean the back garden is not overlooked.  The apartment is situated in a leafy, tranquil, and much sought-after estate, which more importantly is a safe and very friendly neighbourhood. There is no through traffic to speak of. There is a private park in the centre of the estate, and a small supermarket and a chemist are just a short stroll away.  The apartment has an excellent location, about five minutes walk from the gates to Malahide Castle and Gardens, which apart from the castle, the gardens, the parkland, the woodland, and the sports facilities, now contains an Avoca shop and cafe for resting up in after using the sports facilities. Malahide village itself is 15 minutes walk away and has lots of amenities: a library, a marina, schools, sports grounds, clubs, associations, gyms, hotels, shops, cafes, restaurants, pubs... too many to list. And of course the estuary and Malahide and Portmarnock beaches are close at hand as well.  The apartment comes with one driveway parking space, plus ample on-street parking. Public transport links are plentiful. The apartment is five minutes walk from the bus stops on the 42 Dublin - Malahide bus route, and the 102 Malahide - Swords - Airport bus route, and less than a mile from Malahide village, which has a railway station served by Dart trains and intercity trains. Depending on traffic, the apartment is 10 minutes drive from Swords, and the Pavilions shopping centre with its multi-screen cinema, 12 minutes from Dubin Airport, and 20 minutes from Dublin city centre. Easy access to the M1 and the M50, too.  The deposit is equal to one month's rent. References are required. Garden maintenance is included in the rent, but please note other bills are not included. Viewing recommended. Please send me an email via Daft if you'd like to arrange a viewing.  Thank you for reading all of this. :)

property_description: Chadbury, Claremont Road comes to the market in immaculate order, with five bedrooms and extensive living and entertaining space.   Recently completely redecorated, this fine period property has parking to the front for four cars, with electric gates.   At hall floor, the formal drawing room to the front of the house has a feature bay window, original fireplace and the solid timber flooring has been sanded stained and varnished.   Original double doors open in to a large formal dining room, with the same restored flooring.  Further double doors open in to a large family living room, with vaulted ceiling, fireplace and the same polished floor as seen in the formal reception rooms.   This open plan living room is separated from the kitchen by a full height chimney breast.  Double doors lead to a sunny rear garden with patio and lawn.   The kitchen, hand painted with extensive cabinetry, stone counter tops and a range of appliances, is further complimented by a utility room with access to the side of the house.   On the first return and first floor, there are three double bedrooms and a family bathroom. The Master suite incorporates a dressing room and bathroom with bath, shower and WHB.   On the top floor, there are two further double bedrooms, a shower room and a study.   The house is presented in excellent decorative condition and is located just moments from Sandymount Village.   Sandymount Dart station is just 5 minutes walk from the house, and schools in the area include Marian College, St Michaels, Star of the Sea National School, St Matthews National School.   Access to Dublin Airport via the Port Tunnel is within 5 minutes drive, and Dublin City Centre is just 10 minutes journey on the Dart, or 30 minutes, on foot.

It is a five minute stroll to the Peoples Park which has a great childrens play area, a lovely restaurant and a super outdoor market every Sunday.  There is one secure car space included.  There are many extra and unusual features to this apartment and it really needs to be viewed to be appreciated.

property_title: Dartry house, Orwell woods, Orwell Park, Dartry, Dublin 6
property_description: Opportunity  to acquire 1 of the magnificent & largest , most comfortable home living residential apartments.  This Award winning home , voted in 7 best places to live in Dublin is just a short walk to Rathgar , Ranelagh , Milltown & Rathmines .  * NB * NEW PENTHOUSE APT house is now available from August . One of a total number of 7 Apts , this is a luxurious  , spacious  2 bed ,christoff branded fully fitted  kitchen with marble work tops & range cooker , utility room , generously  sized living / dining room .. .Reduced Priced at Â€2950 on a 12 month lease .  This apartment is available to view  by appointment.  Pay in particular , attention to photos    2 Ensuite bedroom   Fully alarmed   Parking   Quiet residential location overlooking Dartry park & river   PLEASE E MAIL All Enquiries , ADVISING YOUR  contact number for us to reply to .     This apartment now enjoys the graceful aspects of living within this well proportioned period property with separate private parking spaces behind the automated gates provided to the front of the house off Orwell Woods. Apartment occupants can enjoy the mature setting of this Victorian residence with views over and access to the listed formal gardens located adjacent to the house, Dartry park & dodder river situated below the elevated site.   This is simply a magnificently stunning and most spacious apartment .  This dwelling offers comfortable and spacious living in one of the most sought after areas of Dublin.  Accommodation, just short of 1200 sq ft, briefly comprises of entrance hallway leading to the opulent living room  with 8 seater dining area in the magnificent living room with fireplace ,  fully  fitted Christoff designed kitchen  & granite work tops with range cooker .   2 large ensuite bedrooms.     Attention to design and workmanship detail in this apartment is second to none, with Christoff coving &  granite fitted kitchen worktops & presses , Christoff wardrobes & bedroom fittings , high quality carpets featuring as standard.   The house itself is situated just off Orwell Park which is a short walk from Milltown Luas stop, offering easy access to both the city centre and Dundrum village , both no more than 10 minutes luas ride away .  All of the amenities of Rathgar and Milltown are but a short stroll .    This house has been voted " 5 star hotel suite " equivalent vaccommodation ,most recently recognised and voted as in the top 7 most desirable, " most gourgeous apartments to live in Dublin" in " In Dublin magazine " . All apartments in this House are in use by Corporate , executive tenants in this most prestigious development.   Dartry House was originally built in 1810 and has been associated with its previous famous owner, the entrepreneur and industrialist William Martin Murphy. This residence underwent extensive conservation and restoration works in 2010  to provide 7 new spacious and generous luxury apartments within. property_description: Bathrooms: 1, ensuites: 1   Minimum 1 Year Lease Available Immediately   This spacious property has 2 double bedrooms, master bedroom has an ensuite and both rooms have built in wardrobes. There is a large open plan kitchen / dining / living area, that leads onto a balcony. All the fixtures and fittings are new, contemporary and excellent quality. The large modern 2 bedroom apartment is available in the beautifully maintained St Edmunds which is situated just minutes from Liffey Valley Centre. This stylish unit would suit professionals as well as families.   St Edmunds is beautifully landscaped and well maintained and is a very secure and popular living destination. The development is located moments from the junction of the M50 and N4, providing quick and easy access to locations around Dublin and beyond. The city centre is approximately 9km away and the airport is accessible along the M50. Buses depart to and from the city centre approximately every five minutes, and are given priority during rush hour along the routes extensive bus corridors. Buses connect with Heuston Station, allowing further connections with the LUAS red line or local and national train services. The Liffey Valley area is transforming into an exciting hub for young professionals with the recent development of new hotels and bars, Dublin' s premier health and fitness centres, and the country' s landmark shopping and entertainment experience, the Liffey Valley Shopping Centre. Modern business parks are also on the rise, with many companies choosing the area as a smart new address within easy reach of the city centre.    Viewing highly recommended to truly appreciate St Edmunds, the location and the property. facility: Parking,Central Heating,House Alarm,Cable Television,Washing Machine,Dryer,Dishwasher,Microwave,Internet,Garden / Patio / Balcony
property_description: A fabulous, large, luxury apartment located just a short, 5-minute walk from St. Stephen's Green.   The apartment is the full lower ground floor of a stunning, Georgian house, with its own private entrance and secluded south-facing back garden.  It has a luxurious spec and offers 90sq.m, of immaculately finished, spacious, open-plan living.  The property has been completely refurbished to a very high standard, with marble bathrooms, high spec kitchen and hardwood and marble floors throughout.  With parking also available, at extra cost.  Perfect for business, romance, or families.  The location is brilliant for all Dublin has to offer.  Just minutes away from St. Stephen's Green/Grafton Street and excellently situated for most of Dublin city's business areas.  Everything is within walking distance, or you can take a Dublin City Bike for hire (on our street).  As it is a city location, unsurprisingly we don't have a parking space, but we can arrange garage parking 100m away for approx. €50 per week.  We've created a place which is a real home away from home.  Feel free to use everything in the apartment: fully stocked kitchen, Nespresso maker and wine fridge.  We also have Virgin TV (with 100 channels plus Netflix) and super-fast broadband 240Mb, with telephone.  This can be transferred or cancelled.    Specifics of rooms: Kitchen/dining room: range cooker, wine fridge, fridge/freezer, Nespresso machine, microwave, quartz worktops, fully stocked with high quality cooking utensils and everything you need. Open plan area with glass-topped dining table to seat 4/5 people. Leading to... open-plan living area. L-shaped couch, flat screen TV with Virgin Broadband TV. Double doors leading to a private back garden. Master bedroom with queen size bed, two built-in wardrobes and original fireplace, flat screen TV with Amazon TV,  marble-tiled en-suite bathroom with power shower. Shuttered window overlooking private courtyard front garden. Second bedroom with double bed, built-in wardrobes - and separate luxury, natural stone bathroom, with bath and shower.  Sash window overlooking the private back garden. The bedrooms are at opposite ends of the apartment for added privacy. There is a separate laundry area with a washing machine and tumble dryer. Private back garden. South facing, sunken courtyard with natural stone paving and outdoor table and chairs. Steps leading to the lawn (with artificial grass - no mud!) and bench seat. Finished with high fencing giving a very secluded feel. Private, courtyard front garden.  Paved in natural stone.  Weekly cleaning & linen service provided at an extra cost. Babysitting available upon request.   Please call for more details on availability.  More on the local area: the apartment is the beautiful residential area of Portobello, which is full of Georgian elegance and quirky coffee shops.  If you turn right, you head towards Camden Street with its restaurants, bars and shops, then it's a short stroll to St. Stephen's Green/Grafton Street - and you are right in the heart of Dublin where you can find everything cultural, business, shopping, restaurants and great bars/clubs.  We are also close to the canal. I run along it when I'm back.  It's great first thing in the morning.  There is also a good pay-as-you-go leisure centre in Rathmines called The Swan Leisure Centre, just a 5 minute walk away with a swimming pool, classes and gym.    Getting around. You are set in a great spot for walking to where you want to go.  If that's not your thing, take a Dublin Bike - you can hire one from our street, there is a drop off spot on Grantham Street.  It's a great way to get around the

property_title: Towerville, St John\'s Road, Sandymount, Dublin 4
property_description: First floor two bedroom apartment presented to an exceptionally high standard  This apartment has been refurbished and decorated throughout. It comprises of a living/dining room (overlooking Sandymount Strand), two double bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen.  Bright throughout.  Parking for One Car.  Close to DART  High BER Rating - The apartment has a very advanced heating and ventilation system that maintains the temperature in all of the apartment above 18 celsius throughout the year but with low running costs. It is also a highly sustainable system as it uses heat from stale air taken from the apartment to heat the radiators. The system monitors the weather all the time to ensure the apartment never gets too hot or too cold. It looks after itself so you don't have to. Hot water is provided 24/7 also by the system, again at very low cost.  The system is called an Exhaust Air Heat Pump, a system that has been used in northern Europe for 20 years.

Fisher Property Management are proud to present the first letting of "Court na Farraga", a luxury self contained 2 bedroom apartment with stunning views of Killiney Bay. As part of the principal residence; this well proportioned apartment offers privacy and exclusivity in a luxurious setting.  Access is through secure automated gates where the sweeping drive way ascends to a magnificent enclave of landscaped gardens and terraces. Facing the property is perhaps the most stunning sea-view along the Dublin coastline. The beach and cove of Killiney is practically minutes away on foot. In addition there are a host of local amenities including shops & restaurants nearby and the local DART station offers a regular service into the City Centre.   The stylishly appointed apartment has two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes offering ample storage space. The bathroom is tiled in marble and all fittings offer style and substance to compliment this architecturally designed residence.  The kitchen is fully appointed and equipped with all necessary appliances. Adjoining the kitchen is the dining area and lounge area. From the lounge, the oversized window looks out over a private terrace and lawn and beyond to the Irish Sea. From here you can take in the natural beauty of the vista and enjoy the peaceful setting.  As part of this letting a weekly cleaning and linen service is included in the rent price. In addition, hot water, heating and internet access are also included.   This location befits quiet and peaceful living in one of Dublin's most exclusive rental addresses. Seldom does an opportunity like this come to the market. Close proximity to the M50, M/N11 &  DART Line ensures ease of access to the City's primary transport routes. Viewing is strictly by appointment and indications suggest that demand for this property will be high. Please contact our offices for further information and appointment times.

Available IMMEDIATELY for 9 months / 1 year.   * Cable tv and 250mgbt wireless broadband are currently installed.   * Walking distance of Google, Facebook, Twitter, Temple Bar, City Centre, Dart and regional trains etc   The apartment is available to view this week by appointment. Please email for further information.     Westland Square is slap bang in the centre of Dublin. It is Dublin 2 - the City's premier business and cultural district, directly opposite historic Trinity College. It is  and about three minutes walk from both Government Buildings and the Irish Financial Services Centre.   The apartment is located about 150 metres from the river with a pedestrian bridge to the Convention Centre Dublin and within five or six minutes walk are the National Gallery of Ireland, the National Library, the National History Museum and Leinster House, the seat of the Irish parliament.   Nearby theatres include the Bord Gais Energy Theatre, the world famous Abbey Theatre, the Gate Theatre, and the O2 arena is a short walk across the Liffey.   Dublin's five star shopping area, Grafton Street, is diagonally across Trinity college park and a little further away is the Guinness Storehouse visitor centre.   Just along Townsend street are convenience stores and the local leisure centre with gymnasium, swimming pool and sauna etc.   Dublin's famous music pubs such as O'Donoghue's in Merrion Row, literary pubs such as the Baily and sports pubs in Temple Bar the city's nightlife hub, are all around you.    Westland Square is fantastically located with all the amenities of a city centre on your doorstep.   Private secure parking can be arranged for a small daily fee, payable locally, as can maid service.   Public transport is available through Westland Row Railway Station which is opposite Westland's Square's  Pearse Street gate.   Just two stops on the Dart electric train take you to the Aviva Stadium (formerly Lansdowne Road), the home of Irish Rugby. Dart also offers access to long sandy beaches along the Dublin Coast, with the Viking fishing village of Howth at one end and Killiney Hill at the other. Dart also links to intercity and regional rail services.    The city's electric tram lines are a short walk at St Stephen's Green and across the river passing the Convention Centre. The national bus station, Bus Aras  is just across the river.   Westland Square is a gated complex which includes both residential and office accommodation. It enjoys the services of an on-site watchman  and is  a bright,  pleasant place from which to explore the city or work. The apartment is fully furnished and in walk-in condition. All bed linen and towels are supplied laundered or new, and the apartment is equipped down to soap and shoe polish with study desks in each bedroom. PRIVATE VIEWING- FIRST LETTING CONSTRUCTED OCTOBER 2017 CONTEMPORARY DESIGN - Large Brand New 2 AND 3 Bed Apartments - CCTV - 1 Allocated parking space & Basement Storage .Shannon Homes are delighted to offer to the rental market a selection of 2 & 3 Bedroom apartments in our latest development launching October 2017. Prices ranging from €1600 per unit for 2 bed & €1,800 for 3 bed depending on floor types.  All apartments are serviced by means of a Sustainable energy Heat Recovery/District Heating system with heat and hot water costs as little as 1 euro per day.   Purpose built by Shannon Homes to a very highest standards and excellent specification and design boosting high quality furniture and fittings. Shannon Homes have an outstanding reputation over several decades for quality construction, finishes and landscaping.  LOCATION -Situated on the Malahide Road adjoining the mature residential developemnts of St Doolaghs , St Sampsons and Castlemoyne the develeopment is within 5 minutes walk to QBC offering easy access to the city centre. There is an abundance of shopping and cafe facilities within walking distance including Clarehall Shopping centre and Northern Cross convenience stores. Access by rail is a mere 15 minute walk to Clongriffin Dart Station which offers a free park and ride facility. The development is within walking distance of Father Collins park and a short drive to Malahide Castle which offer exceptional family recreational facilities. This ideal location offers easy access to Dublin Airport and the M50 aswell as the picturesque villages of Malahide, portmarknock and Howth. Clontarf and the east link are easily serviced by means of the Quality Bus Corridors.  Facilities- Each apartment has extra-large balconys and basement storage. Main bedrooms with ensuite Fitted wardrobes in all bedrooms, Separate utility room with washer/dryer, Spacious balconies / terraces Recessed light fittings / chrome fittings in living/kitchen areas -Floor tiling in hallways Heated mirrors / Stylish well tiled bathrooms and ensuites Fully fitted high quality kitchens Exceptional sound insulation and air tightness award winning Low cost CHP central heating and ventilation from sustainable energy Heat Recovery/District Heating systems .Landscaped grounds ,Lifts serving all floors with external and entrance lobby Closed Circuit Televison. A centralised heating system and cold water storage solution have been installed and this results in more apartment space for the occupier which is not taken up by plant. Each unit has a district heating sub- station and this meters the energy used by the occupant to heat the apartment and generate hot water. While the boiler plant is not in the apartment each occupier can adjust the operating conditions they require. In tandem with this modern heating solution the apartments have been built with high levels of insulation and air tightness, both of which ensure that heating bills will be lowered. To maintain comfort in the apartments each unit is fitted with a heat recovery ventilation system. The air in the apartment is constantly cycled with stale damp air being removed and fresh outside air in added, in a controlled manner. The heating from the outgoing air stream is transferred across to the incoming fresh air and this greatly limits the heat losses to the space.  Enquiries by E mail only Rents starting From €1800       Daft Property Shortcode:http://www.daft.ie/21770942Date Entered/Renewed:6/9/2017 (4 days ago)Property Views: 1,665

property_description: PRIVATE VIEWING- FIRST LETTING CONSTRUCTED OCTOBER 2017 CONTEMPORARY DESIGN - Large Brand New 2  AND 3 Bed Apartments - CCTV  - 1 Allocated parking space & Basement Storage .Shannon Homes are delighted to offer to the rental market a selection of 2 & 3 Bedroom apartments  in our latest development launching October 2017. Prices ranging from €1600 per unit depending on floor types.   All apartments are serviced by means of a Sustainable energy Heat Recovery/District Heating system with heat and hot water costs as little as 1 euro per day.  Purpose built by Shannon Homes to a very highest standards and excellent specification and design boosting high quality furniture and fittings. Shannon Homes have an outstanding reputation over several decades for quality construction, finishes and landscaping. LOCATION -Situated on the Malahide Road  adjoining  the  mature residential developemnts of St Doolaghs , St Sampsons and Castlemoyne  the develeopment is within 5 minutes walk to QBC offering easy access to the city centre. There is an abundance of shopping and cafe facilities within walking distance including Clarehall Shopping centre and Northern Cross convenience stores. Access by rail is a mere 15 minute walk to Clongriffin Dart Station which offers a free park and ride facility. The development is within walking distance of Father Collins park and a short drive to Malahide Castle which offer exceptional family recreational facilities. This ideal location offers easy access to Dublin Airport and the M50 aswell as the picturesque villages of Malahide, portmarknock and Howth. Clontarf and the east link are easily serviced by means of the Quality Bus Corridors. Facilities-  Each apartment has extra-large balconys and basement storage. Main bedrooms with ensuite Fitted wardrobes in all bedrooms, Separate utility room with washer/dryer, Spacious balconies / terraces Recessed light fittings / chrome fittings in living/kitchen areas -Floor tiling in hallways Heated mirrors / Stylish well tiled bathrooms and ensuites Fully fitted high quality kitchens Exceptional sound insulation and air tightness award winning Low cost CHP central heating and ventilation from sustainable energy Heat Recovery/District Heating systems .Landscaped grounds ,Lifts serving all floors with external and entrance lobby Closed Circuit Televison. A centralised heating system and cold water storage solution have been installed and this results in more apartment space for the occupier which is not taken up by plant. Each unit has a district heating sub- station and this meters the energy used by the occupant to heat the apartment and generate hot water. While the boiler plant is  not in the apartment each occupier can adjust the operating conditions they require. In tandem with this modern heating solution the apartments have been built with high levels of insulation and air tightness, both of which ensure that heating bills will be lowered. To maintain comfort in the apartments each unit is fitted with a heat recovery ventilation system. The air in the apartment is constantly cycled with stale damp air being removed and fresh outside air in added, in a controlled manner. The heating from the outgoing air stream is transferred across to the incoming fresh air and this greatly limits the heat losses to the space. Enquiries by E mail only Rents starting From €1600

property_description: Bright and spacious fully furnished two bedroom apartment with two parking spaces in a much sought after small secure development.  Apartment consists of living/dining room, balcony, fully fitted Kitchen with integrated appliances, two double bedrooms (one ensuite) with fitted wardrobes, bathroom, walk in hot press and separate large storage cupboard. Wooden floors throughout.  The complex has landscaped gardens and the property is maintained to high standard. An active management company is in place  The property is ideally located just off the South Circular Road within easy access to the City Centre and the N4/M50.  A few minutes walk to the Red Luas Line (Suir Road), on the 123 Bus Route, 5 minutes to St James' Hospital and 10 minutes to the Coombe Hospital. Dublin City bike are also available outside.   Very close to Kilmainham Gaol, IMMA, The Memorial Gardens and Phoenix Park.  The apartment is available to rent from 16th September.

*EMAIL ENQUIRIES ONLY PLEASE*  Newly renovated and refurbished 1 double bed apartment situated in an oasis of tranquillity on the banks of the Grand Canal, Suir Bridge, Kilmainham.   Fully fitted kitchen with new appliances. New electric storage heaters (night rate ESB) installed in the living room and bedroom.   The apartment is located in a secure compound with electronic gate for vehicles and pedestrians together with an on site caretaker 24/7. The apartment has ample parking for residents and visitors and a private tennis court.  Transport is well served with a 3 minute walk to the Luas Suir Road stop and easy access to St. James's Hospital, Heuston Station, Phoneix Park and City Centre (3.3Km).  Apartment has a South facing patio looking onto communal gardens. The garden boasts mature trees and shrubs, a waterfall and bog oak sculptures including walkways for residents to stroll.   No smoking or pets.

property_description: Landlord Solutions & Property Management are delighted to bring this beautiful 3 bedroom apartment to the market. Accommodation comprises of entrance hall, fully equipped kitchen, dining/lounge area, storage closet, 3 bedrooms with main bathroom. The property has a UPC digital TV and broadband installed. The Development boasts launderette facilities and onsite security. The Complex is located just 20-25 minutes from Dublin City Centre and 5 minutes from Dublin International Airport. The location is well served by Public Transport and Local Amenities.  The Complex is located a short walk from The OMNI Park Shopping Centre & Cineplex, IKEA, Spar, Centra, ALDI, Tesco, Costa Coffee, Crowne Plaza Hotel and Northwood Fitness Club. School House Court specializes in providing student accommodation to students of Dublin City University, St Patrick's College and All Hallow's College because of its location which is 10 minutes walk from all 3 colleges. With Dublin City only a 10-15 minutes of a bus ride away. Viewing highly recommended so please contact Brian to arrange a viewing.  PLEAE NOTE; The lease is for 12 months.

property_description: ****PLEASE REPLY VIA EMAIL ONLY ****  BRACKEN ESTATES (01 4966444) is delighted to present this modern, spacious and recently painted two-bedroom ground floor apartment located in this much sought after residential development off the scenic Coast Road, Malahide.   Accommodation comprises a spacious hall way with solid oak floor and hot-press.  Bathroom: 1.73m x 2.25m with w.c., w.h.b., bath, tiled floor, partly tiled walls, shaving light, extractor fan  Bedroom (1) 3.35m x 4.20m with quality built-in wardrobes. En-suite with w.c., w.h.b., shower cubicle, tiled floor, partly tiled walls, shaving light, extractor fan.  Bedroom (2) 2.66m x 3.41m with quality built-in wardrobes.  Living / dining room: 3.82m x 7.57m with solid oak floor, feature fireplace with gas fire, ceiling coving, two large patios, one south facing and one east facing.  Kitchen: 2.26m x 2.52m with fully fitted wall/floor units, integrated fridge/freezer, dishwasher, washing machine, oven/hob/extractor fan, tiled floor.  Communal, ample car parking  Gas fired central heating Fully integrated kitchen appliances Meticulously maintained gardens Two large patios, one east facing and one south facing Gated entrance and security intercom to apartment block Picturesque setting off Coast Road with sea views 72 Sq. Metres (775 Sq. Feet)  From Malahide Village, proceed on Main Street, onto Coast Road (R106) passing the Grand Hotel and Island View Hotel, both on the right-hand side. Take the third turn right after the Island View Hotel (Oscar Taylor's) into the Robswall development. The apartment is in the first block on the right-hand side.  The village is served by the DART and the train, run by Irish Rail. The Dublin Bus 42 and 32 day-time routes, the 32X and 142 peak hour express services, and 42N Nite-Link route serve the town from Dublin City Centre. Route 102 serves local areas to / from Dublin Airport (via Swords) and Sutton Station (via Portmarnock).     Bracken Estates PSRA No: 001942

property_title: Pavilion II, Marine Road, Dun Laoghaire, Co. Dublin
property_description: Note: available from early / mid October. Viewing possible 01-08 October.  Elegant three bedroom (one en suite) unfurnished flat in the well-designed Pavilion II building, Dun Laoghaire.  Transport links are excellent with an Aircoach bus stop outside the building (one express bus per hour to Dublin Airport, day and night). Dun Laoghaire Dart train station is exactly 200m from the entrance to the building (the Dart takes 16 mins to Grand Canal Dock station - convenient for LinkedIn / Google / Facebook - and 19 mins to Pearse station).  The flat faces south / southeast and is bright and spacious (approximately 104m2 in area). It was recently decorated in neutral colours and is very calm, with interesting urban views of Marine Road and the nearby church.   In addition to the very large living / dining room (over 40m2 in area), the flat has three bedrooms, two bathrooms (one with shower and toilet and one en suite bathroom with shower/bath, toilet and bidet), and a small south-facing balcony (see floorplan). The flat has an answerphone system, a well-sized storage cupboard in the hall and a cupboard in the main room (for hot water tank and washing machine / dryer).   The Pavilion II building has a combined heat and power system that provides efficient and economic heating and hot water. The flat is wired for internet / TV and telephone.   One secure parking spot can be provided separately. Bicycle parking area is also available.   The apartment is not suitable for smokers or pets.  Subject to negotiation.

property_title: Pavilion II, Marine Road, Dun Laoghaire, Co. Dublin
property_description: Elegant, spacious, secure and bright three-bedroom apartment in the high-spec Pavilion II building, Dun Laoghaire. Wired for internet, phone and TV.  The apartment building is maintained to a high standard and is very well located - next door to a large supermarket, the Pavilion theatre, and a gym, close to restaurants, cafes, cinema and schools, Dun Laoghaire Dart train station (200m) and beautiful Dun Laoghaire harbour (250m).  The apartment faces south / southeast and catches light throughout the day. It is approximately 104m2 in area and was recently decorated in neutral colours. The atmosphere is very calm, with interesting urban views of Marine Road and the nearby church.   The main room (dining / living / kitchen) is almost as large as a one-bedroom apartment (i.e. slightly over 40m2 in area - including a separate kitchen with a dishwasher and well designed storage). As the apartment is unfurnished, a number of layouts are possible as it will accommodate a range of furniture types. The main room leads to a south-facing balcony.  The apartment has three bedrooms. The main bedroom - separated from the rest of the apartment - is very large (28m2), with floor to ceiling windows, ample storage, new carpet, and an en suite bathroom (with shower/bath, toilet and bidet).   At the opposite end of the apartment there are two double bedrooms - both with new carpet - and a shared bathroom (with shower, toilet and storage). The middle bedroom (13.4m2) has a walk-in wardrobe and large windows. The third bedroom (8m2) could also be used as a home office.  The apartment has an answerphone system, a well-sized storage cupboard in the hall, and a cupboard in the main room (for hot water tank and washing machine / dryer).   The Pavilion II building has a combined heat and power system that provides heating and hot water for the entire structure. The system is very efficient and more economic, quieter and safer than individual gas boiler systems.  One secure underground parking spot - with direct access from the lift - can be provided. Secure bicycle parking is also available.   Transport links are excellent:  a) Aircoach 703 - bus stop outside front door for hourly, round the clock, service to Dublin Airport  b) Dart - the commuter train to Dublin city centre is one minute's walk from the front door. Travel times are excellent - 16 mins to Grand Canal Dock station (LinkedIn / Google / Facebook), 19 mins to Pearse station (TCD), and 24 minutes to Connolly station (IFSC) c) Bus 7 - to city centre and Cherrywood Luas (light rail) Green Line d) Bus 46a - to UCD, city centre and Phoenix Park e) Bus 75 - to Tallaght f) Bus 63 - to Kilternan g) Go-Car short term rental system (cars by the hour)   The apartment is not suitable for smokers or pets.  Please get in touch if you would like to arrange a viewing.

property_title: Penthouse, Coliemore Road, Dalkey, Co. Dublin
property_description: "HOW THE OTHER HALF LIVE" are the words that came to mind of the Estate Agent on seeing this "beauty" in Dalkey!  ****Fantastic penthouse with unobstructed  sea views from every room and terrace***** ****2.300 sq,ft of magical accommodation in the wonderful seaside resort of Dalkey**** What more could one possibly ask for?   This property is simply magical, for a multitude of reasons, from the stylish and most tasteful decor, soft furnishings and furniture, to the beautiful lighting and high quality finishes, not to mention the truly stunning and completely unobstructed views in every room.   The accommodation comprises a fantastic reception room, a very swish kitchen, large size master bedroom with en suite bathroom, two other large double bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, 2 family bathrooms comprising Jacuzzi and steam room and those 3 private terraces with the most stunning views!There are two secure underground car spaces.   Now let's say a little on the location. Coliemore Harbour is one of the fine harbours in Dalkey and in the middle ages, was the main harbour for Dublin City. Dalkey has a "history and a half"...it is the original hometown of several fine Irish writers, including Maeve Binchy and playright Hugh Leonard. James Joyce and George Bernard Shaw also had close associations with the area....indeed Joyce lived in the Joyce Tower in Sandycove and set the first chapter of his novel, Ulysses, there.  Several well known music figures including Bono and The Edge, Enya, Chris de Burgh and Van Morrison have bought residences in Dalkey and Film Director Neil Jordan lives in the Town.  The village of Dalkey is truly a most picturesque and charming place with its vast array of fine pubs like Finnegans and an abundance of fine restaurants and boutiques. The well knows "Dalkey Book Festival" is a must every year as is the "Dalkey Lobster Festival"  which showcases local seafood and global jazz musicians.   Dalkey is served by the DART and bus services and enjoys fantastic access to the wider road network including the N11 and M50, not that anyone would ever has a reason to leave the village!!  There is something for everyone in this wonderful village ...........and that coupled with the most wonderful penthouse... should make for a most charmed existence!!  Call Geraldine Keary at Keary Estates today for your own private viewing.

property_description: EXCELLENT 2 BED APT  Spacious, Light-Filled, 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Top-Floor Apartment with designated Secure Parking in this contemporary gated development just off Santry Avenue. Accommodation consists of an entrance hall with storage closet, large open plan kitchen / dining / living room, 2 double bedrooms, family bathroom and ensuite.   The Kitchen / Living Area is south-west facing and is very brightly lit throughout the day, with full-height, full-width sliding doors opening onto a large balcony (9 sq metres). The balcony gets direct sunlight in the afternoon. The cosy dining area can comfortably accommodate 6 people at meal times.  The Kitchen is very well equipped with all modern conveniences. The Living Room has plenty of storage, a large couch and is wired for UPC TV/WIFI connection.   The Master Bedroom has a Super King Size double bed, bedside locker, fitted wardrobes and views across North Dublin as far as Dublin Bay. Also, there is a second UPC connection point in this bedroom. The Ensuite is spacious with Shower, WC, WHB and heated towel rail. The Second Bedroom can be set up as a study with desk and couch/futon or a double bedroom depending on requirements. Both bedrooms are east-facing and are filled with sunshine throughout the morning.   The Family Bathroom is spacious and suitable for a family with children, with Bath, Shower, WC and WHB. The apartment has plenty of storage space.   The complex has many local amenities, in particular Santry Demesne Park, which is great for walking/running and has a large kid's playground. Northwood Fitness Centre is just across the road and it's close to Omni Park Shopping Centre, IKEA, Aldi, M1 / M50, Dublin Airport, with easy access to the City Centre by bus (stops are located directly outside the complex).   The apartment comes with uPVC windows, is well insulated and bills are generally quite low. The Complex is very well maintained as most apartments are owner-occupied and there's lift access to every floor. The apartment is fully wheelchair accessible. Bicycle Parking is available within the grounds and there's waste and recycling facilities within the complex. Secure Visitor Parking is also available.   Viewings will be on 01st - 03rd of October by appointment. Please email only enquiries.

Number 16 is presented in show house condition and boasts numerous features to include bright and light filled interior, designer kitchen, stylish bathrooms with underfloor heating, separate utility room, sunny balcony off the living room, secure underground car space, access to a large communal roof garden with south facing aspect to name a few.  Accommodation comprises of entrance hallway, kitchen/living room with balcony access, master bedroom with en-suite and walk-in wardrobe, second bedroom, main bathroom and storage room.  This property would suit a couple looking to live in a vibrant area within easy reach of the city.  Viewing here is highly recommended.  The Pierre is in the heart of Dun Laoghaire overlooking the sea front and the East Pier.  This hugely sought after location has many attractions and amenities which are all within walking distance. This includes a range of cafes, restaurants, local boutiques, shops and shopping centres. The People's Park with its weekly Farmer's Market and Fallon & Byrne Restaurant are local favourites. The nearby villages of Dalkey, Glasthule and Sandycove also boast a wealth of amenities and the beach at Sandycove. The DART is only minutes' walk from the property and the QBC into the city centre is also nearby. The Rock Road, N11, M11 and M50 are also close by.   Special Features  Exception location overlooking the seafront and the East Pier Small boutique development Show house condition Stylish and chic interior Designer kitchen Contemporary bathrooms with underfloor heating Secure underground car parking space Access to a large communal terrace
